chinese: 可怜之人必有可恨之处
pinyin: kě lián zhī rén bì yǒu kě hèn zhī chù
meaning: Play stupid games, win stupid prizes / Pitiful people have their own hateful qualities
description: The idea is that "pitifulness" can be divided into "genuine" and "fake". "Genuine pitifulness" is like fate and hard to change, but "fake pitifulness" can be improved with effort. The thought is that those who become pitiful have actually sown the seeds of their own misery.

examples.chinese: 可怜之人必有可恨之处不是没有道理的
examples.translation: It is not unreasonable that pitiful people must have their own hateful qualities

examples.chinese: 可怜之人必有可恨之处,一切皆有因果
examples.translation: Pitiful people must have their own hateful qualities, everything has a cause and effect

examples.chinese: 可怜之人必有可恨之处,但是我现在这个状况,真的只有可怜形容了吧
examples.translation: They say pitiful people have their hateful qualities, but my current situation can really only be described as pitiful
